metadata.synopsis: The players have reached the portion of the upper hall that will lead to the brain battle. The Netherbrain presence can already be seen with brain goo and tentacles coming down from the roof. This AD directs the player that the stem can't be climbed here and that they need to go further up the building.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Approach the Netherbrain stem past in the High Hall Interior (past the courtyard battle in Endgame.)

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Looks like part of the Netherbrain. But we'll need to be higher up to climb it.
